verses.verse: Now the children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> and the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> had a very <WH3966> great <WH6099> multitude <WH7227> of cattle <WH4735>: and when they saw <WH7200> the land <WH776> of Jazer <WH3270>, and the land <WH776> of Gilead <WH1568>, that <WH4725>, behold, the place was a place <WH4725> for cattle <WH4735>;

the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> and the children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> came <WH935> and spake <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, and to Eleazar <WH499> the priest <WH3548>, and unto the princes <WH5387> of the congregation <WH5712>, saying <WH559>,
Ataroth <WH5852>, and Dibon <WH1769>, and Jazer <WH3270>, and Nimrah <WH5247>, and Heshbon <WH2809>, and Elealeh <WH500>, and Sebam <WH7643>, and Nebo <WH5015>, and Beon <WH1194>,

the land <WH776> which Jehovah <WH3068> smote <WH5221> before <WH6440> the congregation <WH5712> of Israel <WH3478>, is a land <WH776> for cattle <WH4735>; and thy servants <WH5650> have cattle <WH4735>.

And they said <WH559>, If we have found <WH4672> favor <WH2580> in thy sight <WH5869>, let this land <WH776> be given <WH5414> unto thy servants <WH5650> for a possession <WH272>; bring us not over <WH5674> the Jordan <WH3383>.

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410>, and to the children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205>, Shall your brethren <WH251> go <WH935> to the war <WH4421>, and shall ye sit here <WH3427>?
And wherefore discourage ye <WH5106> the heart <WH3820> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> from going over <WH5674> into the land <WH776> which Jehovah <WH3068> hath given them <WH5414>?
Thus did <WH6213> your fathers <WH1>, when I sent <WH7971> them from Kadesh-barnea <WH6947> to see <WH7200> the land <WH776>.

For when they went up <WH5927> unto the valley <WH5158> of Eshcol <WH812>, and saw <WH7200> the land <WH776>, they discouraged <WH5106> the heart <WH3820> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, that they should not go <WH935> into the land <WH776> which Jehovah <WH3068> had given them <WH5414>.
And Jehovah <WH3068>'s anger <WH639> was kindled <WH2734> in that day <WH3117>, and he sware <WH7650>, saying <WH559>,

Surely <WH518> none of the men <WH582> that came up <WH5927> out of Egypt <WH4714>, from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward <WH4605>, shall see <WH7200> the land <WH127> which I sware <WH7650> unto Abraham <WH85>, unto Isaac <WH3327>, and unto Jacob <WH3290>; because they have not wholly <WH4390> followed me <WH310>:

save Caleb <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh <WH3312> the Kenizzite <WH7074>, and Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>; because they have wholly <WH4390> followed <WH310> Jehovah <WH3068>.

And Jehovah <WH3068>'s anger <WH639> was kindled <WH2734> against Israel <WH3478>, and he made them wander <WH5128> to and fro in the wilderness <WH4057> forty <WH705> years <WH8141>, until all the generation <WH1755>, that had done <WH6213> evil <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of Jehovah <WH3068>, was consumed <WH8552>.

And <WH6965>, behold, ye are risen up in your fathers <WH1>' stead <WH8635>, an increase of sinful <WH2400> men <WH582>, to augment <WH5595> yet the fierce <WH2740> anger <WH639> of Jehovah <WH3068> toward Israel <WH3478>.
For if ye turn away <WH7725> from after <WH310> him <WH3254>, he will yet again leave <WH3240> them in the wilderness <WH4057>; and ye will destroy <WH7843> all this people <WH5971>.
And they came near <WH5066> unto him <WH559>, and said, We will build <WH1129> sheepfolds <WH1448> here for our cattle <WH4735>, and cities <WH5892> for our little ones <WH2945>:

but we ourselves <WH587> will be ready <WH2363> armed <WH2502> to go before <WH6440> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, until we have brought <WH935> them unto their place <WH4725>: and our little ones <WH2945> shall dwell <WH3427> in the fortified <WH4013> cities <WH5892> because <WH6440> of the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776>.
We will not return <WH7725> unto our houses <WH1004>, until the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> have inherited <WH5157> every man <WH376> his inheritance <WH5159>.

For we will not inherit <WH5157> with them on the other side <WH5676> of the Jordan <WH3383>, and forward <WH1973>; because our inheritance <WH5159> is fallen <WH935> to us on this side <WH5676> of the Jordan <WH3383> eastward <WH4217>.
And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto them <WH6213>, If ye will do this thing <WH1697>, if ye will arm <WH2502> yourselves to go before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068> to the war <WH4421>,

and every armed <WH2502> man of you will pass <WH5674> over <WH5674> the Jordan <WH3383> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>, until he hath driven out <WH3423> his enemies <WH341> from before him <WH6440>,

and the land <WH776> is subdued <WH3533> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>; then afterward <WH310> ye shall return <WH7725>, and be guiltless <WH5355> towards Jehovah <WH3068>, and towards Israel <WH3478>; and this land <WH776> shall be unto you for a possession <WH272> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>.
But if ye will not do so <WH6213>, behold <WH2398>, ye have sinned against Jehovah <WH3068>; and be sure <WH3045> your sin <WH2403> will find you out <WH4672>.
Build <WH1129> you cities <WH5892> for your little ones <WH2945>, and folds <WH1448> for your sheep <WH6792>; and do <WH6213> that which hath proceeded <WH3318> out of your mouth <WH6310>.

And the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> and the children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> spake <WH559> unto Moses <WH4872>, saying <WH559>, Thy servants <WH5650> will do <WH6213> as my lord <WH113> commandeth <WH6680>.
Our little ones <WH2945>, our wives <WH802>, our flocks <WH4735>, and all our cattle <WH929>, shall be there in the cities <WH5892> of Gilead <WH1568>;
but thy servants <WH5650> will pass over <WH5674>, every man that is armed <WH2502> for war <WH6635>, before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068> to battle <WH4421>, as my lord <WH3068> saith <WH1696>.

So Moses <WH4872> gave charge <WH6680> concerning them to Eleazar <WH499> the priest <WH3548>, and to Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>, and to the heads <WH7218> of the fathers <WH1>' houses of the tribes <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.

And Moses <WH4872> said <WH559> unto them <WH1121>, If the children of Gad <WH1410> and the children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> will pass with you over <WH5674> the Jordan <WH3383>, every man that is armed <WH2502> to battle <WH4421>, before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>, and the land <WH776> shall be subdued <WH3533> before <WH6440> you <WH5414>; then ye shall give them the land <WH776> of Gilead <WH1568> for a possession <WH272>:
but if they will not pass over <WH5674> with you armed <WH2502>, they shall have possessions <WH270> among <WH8432> you in the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>.

And the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> and the children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> answered <WH6030>, saying <WH559>, As Jehovah <WH3068> hath said <WH1696> unto thy servants <WH5650>, so will we do <WH6213>.

We will <WH5168> pass over <WH5674> armed <WH2502> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068> into the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>, and the possession <WH272> of our inheritance <WH5159> shall remain with us beyond <WH5676> the Jordan <WH3383>.

And Moses <WH4872> gave <WH5414> unto them <WH1121>, even to the children of Gad <WH1410>, and to the children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205>, and unto the half <WH2677> - tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh <WH4519> the son <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130>, the kingdom <WH4467> of Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>, and the kingdom <WH4467> of Og <WH5747> king <WH4428> of Bashan <WH1316>, the land <WH776>, according to the cities <WH5892> thereof with their borders <WH1367>, even the cities <WH5892> of the land <WH776> round about <WH5439>.
And the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> built <WH1129> Dibon <WH1769>, and Ataroth <WH5852>, and Aroer <WH6177>,
and Atrothshophan <WH5855>, and Jazer <WH3270>, and Jogbehah <WH3011>,
and Beth-nimrah <WH1039>, and Beth-haran <WH1028>: fortified <WH4013> cities <WH5892>, and folds <WH1448> for sheep <WH6629>.
And the children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> built <WH1129> Heshbon <WH2809>, and Elealeh <WH500>, and Kiriathaim <WH7156>,

and Nebo <WH5015>, and Baal-meon <WH1186>, (their names <WH8034> being changed <WH4142>,) and Sibmah <WH7643>: and they gave <WH7121> other names <WH8034> unto the cities <WH5892> which they builded <WH1129>.

And the children <WH1121> of Machir <WH4353> the son <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519> went <WH3212> to Gilead <WH1568>, and took <WH3920> it <WH3423>, and dispossessed the Amorites that were therein <WH567>.
And Moses <WH4872> gave <WH5414> Gilead <WH1568> unto Machir <WH4353> the son <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519>; and he dwelt therein <WH3427>.
And Jair <WH2971> the son <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519> went <WH1980> and took <WH3920> the towns <WH2333> thereof <WH7121>, and called them Havvoth-jair <WH2334>.
And Nobah <WH5025> went <WH1980> and took <WH3920> Kenath <WH7079>, and the villages <WH1323> thereof <WH7121>, and called it Nobah <WH5025>, after his own name <WH8034>.
